Thought for a few seconds >

curl will always just say “Internal Server Error” unless we look at the server tab.
We need to read the red traceback that uvicorn prints, otherwise we're blind.

1 Open the tab that is running uvicorn

It should show a line like:

©) Copy
INFO: Uvicorn running on http:
If you don't see that, the server isn’t running—start it again:
bash O) Copy

uvicorn excuse_api:app --reload
